title: O5-6

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you would first be dealt a lethal blow, your death will instead be delayed by 2 nights. If you are healed within this time, your death timer will be reset.
- If the heal gives invincible defense or higher, your death counter will stop entirely and the next lethal attack will count as the first for your first attribute
- Being attacked while you have a death counter will reduce the timer by 1 night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recontain all anomalies and eliminate all opposing forces.

_”Appears to be in his mid-fifties, but for his military record to be true he'd have to be the oldest Council Member, with some way of extending his lifespan even before joining the Foundation.”_
